      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ImageConverter
      Abstract class that is responsible for providing adictional operations to convert image files to PDF.
      class  OfficeConverter
      Abstract class that is responsible for providing operations to convert office files files to PDF.

      Abstract class that is responsible for providing operations to convert simple files files to PDF.

      Sets the source by file, that will be converted to desired format.

      Sets appropriate configurations for the converter.

      Sets appropriate configurations for the converter.
      AbstractConverter AbstractConverter.to(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
      Sets the OutputStream, that will be the pdf converted to desired format.
      AbstractConverter AbstractConverter.validade()
      Validates the data, as if the file passed is according to the type indicated for the conversion and if any source was passed.
